name: Sword Fight
description:
Fight against waves of enemies, by yourself or wiith a friend on the same screen. Use a variety of weapons and see how long you can survive.

Controls

Left Stick - Move

Right Stick - Control face direction

Right Bumper - Attack 1

Right Trigger - Attack 2

Left Bumper - Dodge/Dash

Left Trigger - Drop Current Item

Click Right Stick - Change Camera zoom in single player
